TEXT.English: Build tamed animals depending on your Myths.
TEXT.French: Construisez des animaux domptés, en fonction des mythes dont vous disposez.

TEXT.English: Animal taming is not domestication. Tamed animals can be further trained.
TEXT.Polish: Oswajanie zwierząt to nie udamawianie. Oswojone zwierzęta mogą być później tresowane.

TEXT.English: Animal training refers to teaching animals specific responses to specific conditions or stimuli. Training may be for purposes such as companionship, detection, protection, and entertainment. The type of training an animal receives will vary depending on the training method used and the purpose for training the animal. For example, a seeing eye dog will be trained to achieve a different goal than a wild animal in a circus.
TEXT.Polish: Tresura, tresowanie (niem. Dressur z fr. dresser) - zespół działań mających na celu przyzwyczajenie, wdrożenie (nauczenie) zwierząt do wykonywania określonych czynności przez wielokrotne ich powtarzanie w jednakowych okolicznościach, wyrabianie lub wytwarzanie przez człowieka odruchów warunkowych u zwierząt, czasem prostych nawyków poprzez stosowanie systemu nagród i kar.

TEXT.English: Tamed animals are similar to subdued animals except they can fight and reveal the map. Their primary use it to spread animal buildings to all of your cities.[PARAGRAPH:2]Some can place resources on the map depending on your tech level, the terrain and the animal.[PARAGRAPH:2]The tamed animal units by [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]saibotlieh[COLOR_REVERT] were just too cool not to be used in a game. If you can think of other uses we should make of them tell us and we wil see what we can do.
TEXT.Italian: Gli animali ammaestrati di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]saibotlieh[COLOR_REVERT] erano troppo fighi per non essere usati in un gioco. Se conosci un altro uso che potremmo farne, diccelo e vedremo ciò che possiamo fare.
TEXT.Polish: Oswojone zwierzęta mogą być tresowane i wykorzystywane w walce.

TEXT.English: Use tamed animals in combat or use them to build extensions to the Zoo or Carnival (ie cage buildings).
TEXT.French: Les animaux domptés peuvent être utilisé au combat, ou pour construire des extensions pour le Zoo ou le Carnaval (ie Construction de cages).
TEXT.Italian: Usa gli animali ammaestrati in combattimento, oppure utilizzali per espandere il tuo Zoo o il tuo Carnivale, costruendo le gabbie.

German.Text: Gezaehmter Loewe:Gezaehmter Loewe:Gezaehmter Loewe:Gezaehmter Loewe:Gezaehmte Loewen:Gezaehmte Loewen:Gezaehmte Loewen:Gezaehmte Loewen
